dct_title_s: Plan topographique du Detroit et des Eaux qui forment la jonction du Lac Erie avec le Lac St. Claire
dct_alternative_sm: Plan topographique du Detroit et des eaux qui forment la jonction du Lac Erie avec le Lac St Clair : dresse pour l'intelligence des voyages du General Callot dans cette partie du continent en 1796.
dct_description_sm: Includes list of property owners in Detroit and over the Canadian border, views from river of Fort du Detroit and Fore Erie, and a descriptive text by C.M. Burton.
"Drawn from a Copy in the "Burton Collection" at Detroit, Michigan."
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
